proposedChanges.value: Ensure hero section includes a concise headline and subheadline with a clear CTA button visible without scrolling.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improving clarity and ensuring the CTA is visible above the fold can increase engagement.

proposedChanges.value: Break down the solution section into clear, scannable bullet points highlighting key features.
proposedChanges.rationale: Enhances scannability and reduces cognitive load, helping users quickly grasp benefits.

proposedChanges.value: Use a comparison table for pricing to make options clear and highlight the most popular choice.
proposedChanges.rationale: A comparison table improves clarity and aids decision-making by emphasizing differences.

proposedChanges.value: Include a dedicated trust section with customer testimonials and recognizable brand logos.
proposedChanges.rationale: Building trust through testimonials and logos can enhance credibility.

proposedChanges.value: Highlight the hero CTA with a contrasting color and concise action-oriented text.
proposedChanges.rationale: A distinct CTA button draws attention and encourages clicks.
risks: Color may not align with brand

proposedChanges.value: Implement a sticky CTA button that follows users as they scroll for constant visibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: Keeps the CTA available at all times, increasing potential conversions.

proposedChanges.value: Reorder sections to present the problem before the solution, ensuring context is established early.
proposedChanges.rationale: Establishing the problem first can create urgency and relevance for the solution.

proposedChanges.value: Incorporate a pattern of trust badges throughout the page to reinforce credibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: Strategically placed trust badges can reaffirm trust without overwhelming.

assumptions: Current design lacks clear CTA prioritization
Trust elements are not prominently displayed
